snippet: The American Studies Association has become the target of widespread criticism after it voted to boycott Israel's higher-education institutions.

byline.original: By PETER SCHMIDT | THE CHRONICLE OF HIGHER EDUCATION

lead_paragraph: The American Studies Association has become the target of widespread criticism after it voted to boycott Israel's higher-education institutions.

headline.main: Backlash Against Israel Boycott Throws Academic Association on Defensive
headline.print_headline: Backlash Against Israel Boycott Throws Academic Association on Defensive
